program.name: python -m ep_bolfi.kadi_tools.fit_exponential_decay
program.description: Please refer to the --help output of this file.

param.description: Choose the value that gets outputted to stdout. The fit function is f(t, a, b, c) = a + b * exp(-(t - t_0) / c). 'asymptote' is a, 'initial value' is b and 'decay rate' is c. 'all' outputs all three in the format '[a, b, c]'.
param.name: parameter-choice

param.description: Choose whether a decay is fitted to currents or voltages.
param.name: data-choice

param.name: rsquared-threshold

param.description: Seconds at the start of each segment to exclude from the exponential fitting procedure to approximate the OCV.
param.name: exclude
